thread.title: Celebrate 'Hobbit Day,' question Star Wars hype with the CraveCast
thread.title_full: Celebrate 'Hobbit Day,' question Star Wars hype with the CraveCast - CNET

author: Eric Mack
title: Celebrate 'Hobbit Day,' question Star Wars hype with the CraveCast
text:
Enlarge Image Happy Birthday, Baggins! New Line/Warner Bros.
Hey, ho, to the CNET studio we go...because this month's CraveCast is also on Hobbit Day ! In honor of what's traditionally observed as the birthdays of Bilbo and Frodo Baggins(es) on September 22, the crew will gather at noon PT on Tuesday to discuss a few stories from a time more like the world of Middle Earth.
We'll chat about really old skeletons and Stonehenge's newly found big brother before doing what we do best -- add to the "Star Wars: The Force Awakens" hype that we've all been caught up in.
Previous CraveCasts From 'Evil Dead' to 'Walking Dead,' the CraveCast gets scared From Ant-Man to giant robot battles on the CraveCast The CraveCast talks sex in space and finding exoplanets at a quicker pace We'll also get Bonnie Burton's take on sex robots -- though not Star Wars ones -- probably.
Join us today, Tuesday, at noon to chime in. Watch the show live by returning to this page, where the video will be embedded below, or watch via YouTube or Livestream and join in the live chat room.
You can share your thoughts and questions in the comments below, and you can also tweet @crave and @EricCMack .
